column3: News;Battambang: A------ suspect was charged and sent to court in the morning of September 17
column4: 2018 on charges of stealing dogs. ------Police arrested and detained near Toul Don Pok pagoda in the O’Cha district of Battambang province at 1 am on September 15th 2018.------Battambang city police commander said the suspect
column7: was accused of stealing dogs in the neighbourhood.------One owner
column11: complained the suspect had killed one of his dogs.------After confessing
column12: the Criminal Division Office of the Provincial Gendarmerie is building a case to send the suspect to the provincial court to act according to the procedures. ------http://www.rasmeinews.com/%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%94%E1%9E%89%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%87%E1%9E%BC%E1%9E%93%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%87%E1%9E%93%E1%9E%9F%E1%9E%84%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%9F%E1%9F%90%E1%9E%99%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%98%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%93%E1%9E%B6%E1%9E%80-5/
